targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "${usage_measurement}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "kWh")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["direction"] == "import")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["energy_type"] == "electricity")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])
  |> sum()

panels.description: Time shown is the **end** of each half hour

targets.query:
import "date"

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: date.sub(d: 25h, from: v.timeRangeStart), stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "${usage_measurement}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "kWh")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["direction"] == "export")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["energy_type"] == "electricity")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 30m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> fill(usePrevious: true)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])
  |> rename(columns: {_time: "_stop", _value: "export_kWh"})
  |> group()

import "date"

from(bucket:"$bucket")
|> range(start: date.sub(d: 25h, from: v.timeRangeStart), stop: v.timeRangeStop)
|> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "${tariffs_measurement}")
|> filter(fn: (r) => r.price_type == "standard-unit-rates")
|> filter(fn: (r) => r.tariff_code == "${electricity_export_tariff}")
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["direction"] == "export")
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["energy_type"] == "electricity")
|> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "p/kWh_inc_vat")
|> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with "export-unit-rates_£/kWh": r._value / 100.0}))
|> keep(columns: ["_time", "export-unit-rates_£/kWh"])

import "date"

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: date.sub(d: 25h, from: v.timeRangeStart), stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "${usage_measurement}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "kWh")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["direction"] == "import")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["energy_type"] == "electricity")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 30m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> fill(usePrevious: true)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])
  |> rename(columns: {_time: "_stop", _value: "import_kWh"})
  |> group()

import "date"
from(bucket:"$bucket")
|> range(start: date.sub(d: 25h, from: v.timeRangeStart), stop: v.timeRangeStop)
|> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "${tariffs_measurement}")
|> filter(fn: (r) => r.price_type == "standard-unit-rates")
|> filter(fn: (r) => r.tariff_code == "${electricity_import_tariff}")
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["direction"] == "import")
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["energy_type"] == "electricity")
|> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "p/kWh_inc_vat")
|> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with "import-unit-rates_£/kWh": r._value / 100.0}))
|> keep(columns: ["_time", "import-unit-rates_£/kWh"])

panels.title: Electricity Import/Export

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "${usage_measurement}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "kWh")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["direction"] == "export")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["energy_type"] == "electricity")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])
  |> sum()

import "date"

consumption =
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "${usage_measurement}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "kWh")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["direction"] == "import")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["energy_type"] == "electricity")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 30m, fn: mean, createEmpty: true)
  |> fill(usePrevious: true)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])
  |> fill(value: 0.0)
  |> rename(columns: {_time: "_stop", _value: "consumption_kWh"})
  |> group()

combinedRates = 
from(bucket:"$bucket")
  |> range(start: date.sub(d: 25h, from: v.timeRangeStart), stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "${tariffs_measurement}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.tariff_code == "${electricity_import_tariff}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["direction"] == "import")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["energy_type"] == "electricity")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field =~ /_inc_vat$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 30m, fn: last, createEmpty: true)
  |> fill(usePrevious: true)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_field", "_value"])
  |> fill(value: 0.0)
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value") 
  |> rename(columns: {_time: "_stop"})

join(
    tables: {consumption:consumption, combinedRates:combinedRates},
    on: ["_stop"]
  )
|> rename(columns: {_stop: "_time"})
|> reduce(fn: (r, accumulator) => ({
      // 48 increments of 30min in a day, then divide by 100 to go from pence to £
      "Standing charge cost": r["p/day_inc_vat"]/48.0/100.0 + accumulator["Standing charge cost"],
      "Usage cost": r.consumption_kWh * r["p/kWh_inc_vat"] / 100.0 + accumulator["Usage cost"],
      "Total cost": r.consumption_kWh * r["p/kWh_inc_vat"] / 100.0 + r["p/day_inc_vat"]/48.0/100.0 + accumulator["Total cost"]
    }),
    identity: {"Standing charge cost": 0.0, "Usage cost": 0.0, "Total cost": 0.0}
   )

import "date"

consumption =
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "${usage_measurement}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "kWh")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["direction"] == "export")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["energy_type"] == "electricity")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 30m, fn: mean, createEmpty: true)
  |> fill(usePrevious: true)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])
  |> fill(value: 0.0)
  |> rename(columns: {_time: "_stop", _value: "consumption_kWh"})
  |> group()

combinedRates = 
from(bucket:"$bucket")
  |> range(start: date.sub(d: 25h, from: v.timeRangeStart), stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "${tariffs_measurement}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.tariff_code == "${electricity_export_tariff}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["direction"] == "export")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["energy_type"] == "electricity")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field =~ /_inc_vat$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 30m, fn: last, createEmpty: true)
  |> fill(usePrevious: true)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_field", "_value"])
  |> fill(value: 0.0)
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value") 
  |> rename(columns: {_time: "_stop"})

join(
    tables: {consumption:consumption, combinedRates:combinedRates},
    on: ["_stop"]
  )
|> rename(columns: {_stop: "_time"})
|> reduce(fn: (r, accumulator) => ({
      // 48 increments of 30min in a day, then divide by 100 to go from pence to £
      "Standing charge cost": r["p/day_inc_vat"]/48.0/100.0 + accumulator["Standing charge cost"],
      "Export revenue": r.consumption_kWh * r["p/kWh_inc_vat"] / 100.0 + accumulator["Export revenue"],
      "Net revenue": r.consumption_kWh * r["p/kWh_inc_vat"] / 100.0 - r["p/day_inc_vat"]/48.0/100.0 + accumulator["Net revenue"]
    }),
    identity: {"Standing charge cost": 0.0, "Export revenue": 0.0, "Net revenue": 0.0}
   )

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "${usage_measurement}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "kWh")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["direction"] == "import")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["energy_type"] == "electricity")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])
  |> sum()

import "timezone"

option location = timezone.location(name: "Europe/London")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "${usage_measurement}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "kWh")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["direction"] == "export")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["energy_type"] == "electricity")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: sum)
  |> timeShift(duration: -1m)
  |> truncateTimeColumn(unit: 1d)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "export"})

import "timezone"

option location = timezone.location(name: "Europe/London")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)

list.definition:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "${tariffs_measurement}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["energy_type"] == "electricity")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["direction"] == "import")
  |> keep(columns: ["tariff_code", "display_name", "_value"])
  |> first()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({display_value: "${r.display_name}#@#${r.tariff_code}"}))
list.name: electricity_import_tariff
